configNotice.title: Saved Configuration Detected
configNotice.message: Configuration has been automatically restored. You can continue from where you left off or start over.

generateModal.title: Generate assets.bin
generateModal.flashingInProgress: Flashing in progress, please do not close the window

wakewordConfig.title: Wake Word Configuration
wakewordConfig.description: Select a preset wake word model or customize it using a command recognition model.
wakewordConfig.notSupported: Your chip does not support wake word functionality.
wakewordConfig.unsupportedMessage: {chipModel} chip does not support wake word functionality. If you need to use wake words, please select ESP32-S3, ESP32-P4, or ESP32-C3/C5/C6 chips.
wakewordConfig.wakewordCommandPlaceholderCN: Pinyin separated by spaces, e.g., ni hao xiao zhi
wakewordConfig.wakewordCommandPlaceholderEN: English words, no punctuation, e.g., HELLO POTATO

tips.optional: Wake words are optional. If disabled, the device cannot be voice-activated.
tips.wakeNet9sOnly: C3/C5/C6 chips only support WakeNet9s lightweight models.
tips.wakeNet9Full: S3/P4 chips support complete WakeNet9 models with more choices.
tips.customSupport: Custom wake words use MultiNet models, currently only supported on ESP32-S3.

errors.resetFailed: Reset failed, please refresh the page and try again
errors.deviceOffline: Device is offline and cannot be flashed
errors.fileTooLarge: Flash failed: File size {fileSize}MB exceeds assets partition size {partitionSize}MB. Please reduce configuration content or use a device with larger capacity.
errors.flashCancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel flashing?
errors.oldDataCleared:
Old version emoji data structure has been detected and cleared.

The new version uses file deduplication technology to save storage space.

Please re-upload custom emoji images.
errors.incompatibleEmojiData: Incompatible emoji data detected, please reconfigure

chipConfig.title: Step 1: Chip Model and Screen Configuration
chipConfig.loadedFromDevice: Hardware configuration automatically loaded from device
chipConfig.loadingDesc: Reading chip model and screen resolution from device
chipConfig.chipModelError: Unable to get chip model, please enter manually
chipConfig.resolutionError: Unable to get screen resolution, please enter manually
chipConfig.timeoutError: Configuration loading timeout, please enter manually
chipConfig.manualConfigHint: Device not connected or offline, please manually input hardware configuration

themeDesign.title: Step 2: Theme Design
themeDesign.description: Configure wake word, font, emoji and background to customize your Xiaozhi AI theme.

generateSummary.title: Step 3: Preview
generateSummary.description: Preview the effect of your custom configuration on the actual device.
generateSummary.configureEmojiFirst: Please configure emoji package in theme design first

backgroundConfig.title: Chat Background Configuration
backgroundConfig.description: Configure chat backgrounds for light and dark modes, supporting solid colors or custom images.
backgroundConfig.clickOrDragToUpload: Click or drag to upload background image
backgroundConfig.selectValidImage: Please select a valid image file

emojiConfig.title: Emoji Collection Configuration
emojiConfig.description: Choose preset emoji package or custom emoji images. Each emoji package contains 21 different emotion expressions.
emojiConfig.noEmojiPackDescription: Don't configure emoji pack, only font and background resources will be included in the package.
emojiConfig.twemojiDescription: High-quality emoji set from Twitter, perfect for clear display
emojiConfig.notoEmojiDescription: Google Noto animated emoji pack, {size}×{size} pixels (requires PSRAM)
emojiConfig.customEmojiDescription: Upload your own emoji images. Each emotion needs one image.
emojiConfig.uploadInstructions: Click or drag to upload emoji images (PNG/JPG/WEBP)
emojiConfig.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, WEBP. Recommended size: 64×64 pixels
emojiConfig.uploadAllEmotions: Please upload emoji images for all emotions
emojiConfig.clickToUploadOrDrag: Click to upload or drag here
emojiConfig.selectValidEmojiImage: Please select a valid emoji image file
emojiConfig.selectValidFormat: Please select a valid PNG or GIF format image
emojiConfig.invalidFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use PNG, JPG, or WEBP.
emojiConfig.neutralRequiredNotice: * Must upload neutral default emotion, others are optional. If not uploaded, default emotion will be used instead.
emojiConfig.sharedFileMessage: Emotion {emotionKey} uses the same image file as {existingEmotions} (shared storage)
emojiConfig.fileDeleted: File {fileHash} has been deleted (no other emotion references)
emojiConfig.fileRetained: File {fileHash} is still used by other emotions, retained

fontConfig.title: Font Configuration
fontConfig.description: Choose preset fonts or upload custom font files.
fontConfig.noFontsDescription: Do not use font configuration, the device will use the default font
fontConfig.fullCharset: Full Character Set (All characters in font file)
fontConfig.hideSubtitleDescription: Do not show real-time text subtitles during conversation
fontConfig.selectValidFontFile: Please select a valid font file (TTF, WOFF, WOFF2)
